# Cadre

> Cadre is a job discovery platform for VC-backed companies. Search and filter
> jobs by investor portfolio, funding stage, function, industry, and location.

Cadre organizes 16,000+ jobs across 1,300+ companies backed by 200+ venture
capital firms including a16z, Sequoia, Founders Fund, Thrive Capital, and
others. Jobs are sourced directly from company ATS feeds (Greenhouse, Lever,
Ashby) and updated daily.

## Key Pages

- Homepage (search and filter all jobs): https://cadre-ui-psi.vercel.app/
- Investor pages (jobs at a specific VC's portfolio): https://cadre-ui-psi.vercel.app/investors/{slug}
- Company pages (all open roles at a company): https://cadre-ui-psi.vercel.app/companies/{slug}
- Industry pages (jobs filtered by sector): https://cadre-ui-psi.vercel.app/industry/{slug}
- Job detail pages: https://cadre-ui-psi.vercel.app/jobs/{id}

## What Makes Cadre Unique

- Relationship graph: Jobs are linked to Companies, which are linked to Investors and Industries
- Filter by investor: Find jobs specifically at a16z, Sequoia, or Founders Fund portfolio companies
- Filter by funding stage, function, location, and remote availability
- Direct ATS sourcing: Jobs come from verified company career pages, not scraped aggregators
